Wuthering Waves Fan Creation Event "By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation" is now live! Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form for a chance to win iPhone 16 Pro 512GB, Astrites and more!

Create your works of boundless imagination to present the world of Wuthering Waves!

Proceed to submit: <https://forms.gle/TDi2WjFK4MNgmFCD6>

Content Requirement

Create your own artwork about Wuthering Waves Version 2.6 "By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation"!

Whether it's an illustration of your beloved character, comical moments from your adventures, or difficult combos you've mastered—anything that aligns with the theme is eligible for submission. Share your artwork or video for a chance to win exciting prizes!

How to Submit

  1. Post your artwork on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook with both hashtags #WutheringWaves and #WuWaFanart included.

  2. Complete the submission form with your submission details. Once done, your submission will be considered successful.

Submission form: <https://forms.gle/TDi2WjFK4MNgmFCD6>

Submission Period

2025/08/28 - 2025/09/28 (PT)

Rewards

1st Place (5 Winners): iPhone 16 Pro 512GB

4th Place (15 Winners): 2,000 Astrites & 200 USD

5th Place (20 Winners): 1,000 Astrites & Official Merchandise

All eligible works will undergo evaluation based on their adherence to the theme, degree of completion, reception among players, and other relevant factors.

entry.title: Patch Notes for Version 2.6: By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation
entry.content:
Dear Rover,

Thank you for your continued support. The following is a summary of content that will become available in Version 2.6: By Sun's Scourge, By Moon's Revelation.

[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-08-28 04:00 - 2025-08-28 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-08-28 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.

✦Bug Fixes Compensation: Astrite x300

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mail feature before 2025-08-28 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

[Gifts of the Moon Roamer]

Log in during the event period to claim the rewards.

✦Rewards: Radiant Tide x10, Forging Tide x10

✦Eligibility: Reach Union Level 8.

✦Duration: 2025-09-17 10:00 - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Version Update Details]

New Resonators

5-Star Resonator: Augusta (Electro/Broadblade)

Ephor of Septimont. The undying sun eternally ablaze, and a banner under which defeat does not exist.

She comes. She sees. She conquers.

With blade held high, she awaits the next challenger or the fate that claims it cannot be defied.

Combat Roles: Main Damage Dealer, Heavy Attack DMG, DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Eternal Radiance on the Crown] Featured Resonator Convene.

5-Star Resonator: Iuno (Aero/Gauntlets)

She is favored by fate under one name, and swept away by it in another.

Yet never once has she been defeated, nor has she ever yielded.

Now, witness the defiant Priestess. Witness what keeps her striding forward, never to look back. Witness how she walks the intricate web of destiny and becomes the only answer.

Combat Roles: Support and Healer, Concerto Efficiency, Resonance Liberation DMG, Heavy Attack DMG Amplification

Obtainable through the [Across Time's Waxes and Wanes] Featured Resonator Convene.

New Weapons

5-Star Weapon: Thunderflare Dominion (Broadblade)

Thunder shall purge her pain and weakness. From the crucible of blood and sand, the Sun rises. Not dimmed by dust, but ablaze in her full radiance.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Thunderflare Dominion] Featured Weapon Convene.

5-Star Weapon: Moongazer's Sigil (Gauntlets)

By what means do all things endure? By light and heat, by matter and word, by the mechanics of converging chances, by the soft dissolution into silence, by a moment that mimics the eternal... All things rise and fall in endless rhythm, each bearing its meaning. As for hers, it lies here within her grasp.

Obtainable through the [Absolute Pulsation - Moongazer's Sigil] Featured Weapon Convene.

Hunter's Growl Series (4-Star): Aureate Zenith (Broadblade), Feather Edge (Sword), Solar Flame (Pistols), Aether Strike (Gauntlets), Radiant Dawn (Rectifier)

The engravings draw inspiration from Griffrexes—natural-born hunters and the first allies Septimontians found in this land. Their bond needs no words, radiant and pure, like the blazing sun that watches over all.

※To obtain a 4-Star Hunter's Growl weapon, purchase and unlock the Insider Channel or Connoisseur Channel of the Pioneer Podcast to obtain a Pioneer Podcast Supply Pack, and open the Pack to claim one Hunter's Growl weapon of your choice.

New Area

[Sanguis Plateaus]

The Sanguis Plateaus serve as both Septimontians' hunting grounds and the first line of defense against the Dark Tide. On these magnificent yet bleak highlands, the Blightcloud hovering above stirs relentlessly.

Here, power and glory reach their peak, then give way to bloodshed and death.

Reach the location during Main Quest Chapter II Act VIII "By Sun's Burning Hand."

New Echoes

Corrosaurus, False Sovereign, Lady of the Sea, Nightmare: Gulpuff, Nightmare: Chirpuff, Nightmare: Cyan-Feathered Heron, Nightmare: Violet-Feathered Heron, Nightmare: Aero Predator, Nightmare: Electro Predator

New Nightmare Purification Challenges: Tideline Verge Nightmare Nest, The Wastelands Nightmare Nest

A set number of Nightmare Tacet Discords are available daily. Defeat them to claim the corresponding Echoes without spending Waveplates.

New Sonata Effects: Crown of Valor, Law of Harmony

Crown of Valor (3pcs Set): Upon gaining a Shield, increase the Resonator's ATK by 6% and Crit. DMG by 4% for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and stacks up to 5 times.

Law of Harmony (3pcs Set): Casting Echo Skill grants 30% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus to the caster for 4s. Additionally, all Resonators in the team gain 4% Echo Skill DMG Bonus for 30s, stacking up to 4 times. Echoes of the same name can only trigger this effect once. The record of Echo triggering this effect is cleared along with this effect. At 4 stacks, casting Echo Skill again resets the duration of this effect.

New Stories

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act VIII: By Sun's Burning Hand

As the High Tide draws near, a lurking calamity stirs, with its gaze fixed upon the borders of Septimont. Ephor Augusta invites you to the Sanguis Plateaus for a fateful hunt, the one that may decide the realm's survival. To recover the lost relic of Sentinel Imperator and halt the Dark Tide before it devours Rinascita once more, you and the Gladiators of Septimont set out for the expedition...

  • Duration: Permanently available after the Version 2.6 update.

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II VII "Dreamcatchers in the Secret Gardens."

[Main Quest] Chapter II Act IX: By Moon's Fated Light

With the Sovereign slain, you attend the victory ceremony by invitation of Ceremonial Officer Bruno. The celebration honors the new Hero of Heroes and those who stood by their side amidst the crackling bonfire and joyous cheers of the crowd... Now that the countless petals are to be thrown into the sky to become the rain of glory and triumph, you might finally reunite with the girl you have never forgotten in a way even beyond fate's grasp.

  • Duration: Permanently available after 2025-09-17 10:00 (server time)

  • Eligibility: Complete Main Quest Chapter II Act VIII "By Sun's Burning Hand."

New Events & Gameplay Features

Special Events:

[Sanguis Plateaus] Area Events

Participate in Area Exploration Event "Hunt of Ash and Steel" to explore the area and win rewards.

Participate in Featured Exploration Event "Sanguis Plateaus Travel Atlas" to increase Exploration Progress for the new location and win Astrites and Premium Tuners.

Participate in Photo Collection Event "Prints of Plateaus" to capture beautiful moments in the Sanguis Plateaus.

  • Duration: Version 2.6 update - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Tidal Defense Simulator] Tacet Discord Tower Defense Event

The agents of the Black Shores have long been the first to respond in times of crisis. To lower the risks they face in fighting the TDs, the Black Shores has developed specialized combat devices designed to counter the threat.

Valentina is now leading simulation tests of the devices, and she's counting on your assistance to push the tests forward.

  • Duration: 2025-08-30 10:00 - 2025-10-08 11:59 (server time)

[Second Coming of Solaris (Ultra)] Leisure Event

Certain anomalies can be found in the game scenes. After locating these anomalies, use the Utility: Zoom Camera to capture them, then work with Bertolt to modify them.

  • Duration: 2025-09-17 04:00 - 2025-10-06 03:59 (server time)

[Marks of the Wild] Limited-Time Puzzle Event

You receive a new message from the Hunter's Den: Please examine the traces left by TDs and track them down.

  • Duration: 2025-09-04 04:00 - 2025-09-22 03:59 (server time)

[Moonlit Revelation] Lunar Phase Divination Event

Log in each day during the event to receive 1 Waveborn Moonstone, up to a total of 10. Use Waveborn Moonstones to decipher Lunar Phases and earn rewards along with limited-time buffs.

  • Duration: 2025-09-25 04:00 - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Beyond the Waves: Rinascita] Featured Exploration Event

Participate and upload your Adventure Logs to the Lollo courier truck to get various Adventure Packages!

  • Duration: 2025-09-25 04:00 - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

[Gifts of the Hunt] 7-Day Login Event

During the event, log in to claim the day's login rewards from the event page.

  • Duration: Version 2.6 update - 2025-10-08 03:59 (server time)

Web Event:

[Back to Solaris]

Invite your former companions back and complete tasks together to receive Astrites, Shell Credits, and more! Returning Rovers who link their accounts will also receive bonus gifts!

  • Duration: Version 2.6 Update - 2025-10-08 23:59 (UTC+8)

Other New Content

Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain Challenge: Lady of the Sea

New Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Fallacy of No Return, Phantom - Kerasaur

Avatars: Wax and Wane, TD Terminator

Title: Catcher in the Tide

Phantom: Fallacy of No Return can be obtained through Tidal Defense Simulator: Tacet Discord Tower Defense Event, while Phantom: Kerasaur can be obtained upon completion of Side Quest: Dream of A Rusted Sword.

[Adjustments and Optimizations]

Resonators & Weapons

  • Optimized the display of some Resonators' icons during combat.

Enemies & Echoes

  • Optimized the special effects used to indicate the triggering of an enemy's Immobilization during combat.

  • Optimized the visual effects associated with the disappearance of a defeated enemy.

Features

**

Gallery**

Added a new category: Weapons

  • Access the page via Terminal > Gallery > Weapons.

  • The Weapons page displays information about weapons and weapon projections.

**

Flight**

Optimized the functionality of Utility: Flight

  • Made Utility: Flight available in Jinzhou and the Black Shores. After Version 2.6 goes live, participate in Windrider Project and complete the Flight tutorials to unlock Utility: Flight in Jinzhou and the Black Shores.

Please note that within these two regions, Utility: Flight is temporarily unavailable in certain areas near water surfaces or the map border; Utility: Flight will be switched to Utility: Glide in these areas.

  • Adjusted the way Utility: Flight can be activated. Use Utility: Flight to leap into the air and start flying.

  • Adjusted the border connections between the regions of Beohr Waters and Septimont on the Map.

Map

Optimized the functionality of the Map

Graphics Settings**

Added XeSS2 frame generation for Intel graphics cards

  • This option is available for all discrete Intel graphics cards.

Added FSR 3 frame generation for AMD graphics cards

To enable this option, your device must meet the two requirements listed below:

  1. AMD RX 6000 or newer.

  2. With DX12 enabled.

AMD RX 5000 Series graphics cards only support FSR 3 without frame generation.

NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is now supported, along with the previous versions.

To enable DLSS 4, your device must meet the two requirements listed below:

  1. RTX 50 Series

  2. With DX12 enabled (first enable Hardware-Accelerated GPU Scheduling in your system's graphics settings).

  • If your device meets the requirements, you can enable the option via Settings > Graphics > Advanced > Frame Generation.

  • If your device meets the DLSS 4 requirements, you can select 2x, 3x, or 4x Frame Generation based on your needs or the performance of your device.

If the original frame rate is too low, enabling Frame Generation can increase the frame rate. Please note that enabling this option may cause input lag or display issues.
